Indicator Name
Age of the establishment (years)
Series Code: Age of the firm based on the year in which the firm began operations.

Series Name: Annual employment growth (%)
Series Code: Annualized growth of permanent full-time workers expressed as a percentage. Annual employment growth is the change in full-time employment reported in the current fiscal year from a previous period. For most countries the difference between the two fiscal year periods is two years. However, for some countries the interval is three years. Hence, an annualized measure is used.

Series Name: Bribery depth (% of public transactions where a gift or informal payment was requested)
Series Code:
The depth of Bribery is the percentage of instances in which a firm was either expected or requested to provide a gift or informal payment during solicitations for public services, licenses or permits. This measure uses data from 6 survey questions for each firm. For purposes of computation, a refusal to answer a particular survey question is
considered an affirmative answer.

Series Name: Bribery incidence (percent of firms experiencing at least one bribe payment request)
Series Code: The percent of firms experiencing at least one bribe payment request across 6 public transactions dealing with utilities access, permits, licenses, and taxes.

Series Name: Capacity utilization (%)*
Series Code: Capacity utilization based on comparison of the current output with the maximum output possible using the

Series Name: Performance
Days to clear direct exports through customs
Series Code: Average number of days to clear direct exports through customs.

Series Name: Days to clear imports from customs*
Series Code: Average number of days to clear imports from customs.

Series Name: Days to obtain a construction-related permit
Series Code: Average wait, in days, to obtain construction-related permit.

Series Name: Days to obtain an electrical connection (upon application)
Series Code:
Average wait, in days, experienced to obtain electrical connection from the day this establishment applied for it to
the day it received the service.

Series Name: Days to obtain an import license
Series Code: Average wait, in days, to obtain import license.

Series Name: Days to obtain an operating license
Series Code: The average wait, in days, to obtain an operating license.

Series Name: If a generator is used, average proportion of electricity from a generator (%)
Series Code: If a generator is used, what percentage of electricity comes from a generator

Series Name: If the establishment pays for security, average security costs (% of annual sales)
Series Code: Average security costs as a percentage of total annual sales for firms that pay for security.

Series Name: If there were losses, average losses due to theft and vandalism (% of annual sales)
Series Code:
If there were losses, estimated losses as a result of theft, robbery, vandalism or arson that occurred on
 establishment's premises calculated as a percentage of annual sales.

Series Name: If there were outages, average duration of a typical electrical outage (hours)
Series Code: Average duration of power outages (hours) conditional on having a power outage.

Series Name: If there were outages, average losses due to electrical outages (% of annual sales)
Series Code: If there were outages, average losses due to electrical outages, as percentage of total annual sales.

Series Name: If there were visits, average number of visits or required meetings with tax officials
Series Code: If there were a positive number of visits or required meeting with tax officials, what was the average number?

Series Name: Number of electrical outages in a typical month
Series Code: Average number of power outages in a typical month.

Series Name: Number of water insufficiencies in a typical month*
Series Code: Average number of water shortages in a typical month in the last fiscal year.

Series Name: Number of workers
Series Code: Number of workers, including permanent and temporary workers. The number of temporary workers is adjusted for the number of months of their employment.

Series Name: Number of years firm operated without formal registration
Series Code: Average number of years firms operated without formal registration. This indicator is computed only for the firms that did not have a formal registration when they started their operations in the country.

Series Name: Percent of firms buying fixed assets
Series Code: Percent of firms buying fixed assets such as machinery, equipment, land or buildings.

Series Name: Percent of firms choosing access to finance as their biggest obstacle
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider access to finance to be the Biggest Obstacle

Series Name: Percent of firms choosing access to land as their biggest obstacle
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider access to land to be the Biggest Obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms choosing business licensing and permits as their biggest obstacle
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider business licensing and permits to be the Biggest Obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms choosing corruption as their biggest obstacle
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider corruption to be the Biggest Obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms choosing courts as their biggest obstacle
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider courts to be the Biggest Obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms choosing crime, theft and disorder as their biggest obstacle
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider crime, theft and disorder to be the Biggest Obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms choosing customs and trade regulations as their biggest obstacle
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider customs and trade regulations to be the Biggest Obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms choosing electricity as their biggest obstacle
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider electricity to be the Biggest Obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms choosing inadequately educated workforce as their biggest obstacle
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider an inadequately educated workforce to be the Biggest Obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms choosing labor regulations as their biggest obstacle
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider labor regulations to be the Biggest Obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms choosing political instability as their biggest obstacle
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider political instability to be the Biggest Obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms choosing practices of the informal sector as their biggest obstacle
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider practices of competitors in the informal sector to be the Biggest Obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms choosing tax administration as their biggest obstacle
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider the tax administration to be the Biggest Obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms choosing tax rates as their biggest obstacle
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider tax rates to be the Biggest Obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms choosing transportation as their biggest obstacle
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider transport to be the Biggest Obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms competing against unregistered or informal firms
Series Code: Percentage of firms competing against unregistered or informal firms.

Series Name: Percent of firms expected to give gifts in meetings with tax officials
Series Code: Percentage of firms expected to give gifts or informal payments during meetings with tax officials.

Series Name: Percent of firms expected to give gifts to get a construction permit
Series Code: Percentage of firms expected to give gifts or informal payments to get a construction permit.

Series Name: Percent of firms expected to give gifts to get a water connection
Series Code: Percentage of firms expected to give gifts or informal payments to get a water connection.

Series Name: Percent of firms expected to give gifts to get an electrical connection
Series Code: Percentage of firms expected to give gifts or informal payments to get an electrical connection.

Series Name: Percent of firms expected to give gifts to get an import license
Series Code: Percentage of firms expected to give gifts or informal payments to get an import license.

Series Name: Percent of firms expected to give gifts to get an operating license
Series Code: Percentage of firms expected to give gifts or informal payments to get an operating license. Spontaneous refusals to the question are treated as a Yes.

Series Name: Percent of firms expected to give gifts to public officials "to get things done"
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider that firms with characteristics similar to theirs are making informal payments or giving gifts to public officials to get things done" with regard to customs

Series Name: Percent of firms expected to give gifts to secure government contract
Series Code: Percentage of establishments that consider that firms with characteristics similar to theirs are making informal payments or giving gifts to public officials to secure government contract.

Series Name: Percent of firms experiencing electrical outages
Series Code: Percentage of firms that experienced power outages over the last complete fiscal year.

Series Name: Percent of firms experiencing losses due to theft and vandalism
Series Code: If there were losses, estimated losses as a result of theft, robbery, vandalism or arson that occurred on establishment's premises calculated as a percentage of annual sales.

Series Name: Percent of firms experiencing water insufficiencies
Series Code: Percentage of firms that experienced insufficient water supply for production over the last complete fiscal year.

Series Name: Percent of firms exporting directly (at least 10% of sales)
Series Code: Percentage of firms that export directly at least 10% of their total annual sales.

Series Name: Percent of firms exporting directly or indirectly (at least 10% of sales)
Series Code: Percentage of firms that export directly or indirectly at least 10% of their total annual sales.

Series Name: Percent of firms formally registered when they started operations in the country
Series Code: Percentage of firms formally registered when they started operations in the country.

Series Name: Percent of firms having their own Web site
Series Code: Percentage of firms using website for business related activities, i.e. sales, product promotion etc.

Series Name: Percent of firms identifying access to finance as a major constraint
Series Code: Percentage of firms identifying access/cost of finance as a "major" or "very severe" obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms identifying an inadequately educated workforce as a major constraint
Series Code: Percentage of firms identifying labor skill level as a major constraint. The computation of the indicator is based on

Country Name: the rating of the obstacle as a potential constraint to the current operations of the establishment.
Series Name: Workforce
Percent of firms identifying business licensing and permits as a major constraint
Series Code: Percentage of firms identifying business licensing and permits as "major" or "very severe" obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms identifying corruption as a major constraint
Series Code: Percentage of firms identifying corruption as a "major" or "very severe" obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms identifying crime, theft and disorder as a major constraint
Series Code: Percentage of firms identifying crime, theft and disorder as a major" or "very severe" obstacle."

Series Name: Percent of firms identifying customs and trade regulations as a major constraint
Series Code: Percentage of firms identifying customs and trade regulations as a "major" or "very severe" obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms identifying electricity as a major constraint
Series Code: Percentage of firms identifying electricity as a major constraint. The computation of the indicator is based on the

Country Name: rating of the obstacle as a potential constraint to the current operations of the establishment.
Series Name: Infrastructure
Percent of firms identifying labor regulations as a major constraint
Series Code: Percentage of firms identifying labor regulations as a "major" or "very severe" obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms identifying practices of competitors in the informal sector as a major constraint
Series Code: Percentage of firms identifying practices of competitors in the informal sector as major constraint. The computation of the indicator is based on the rating of the obstacle as a potential constraint to the current operations of the establishment.

Series Name: Percent of firms identifying tax administration as a major constraint
Series Code: Percentage of firms identifying tax administration as a "major" or "very severe" obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms identifying tax rates as a major constraint
Series Code: Percentage of firms identifying tax rates as a "major" or "very severe" obstacle.

Series Name: Percent of firms identifying the courts system as a major constraint
Series Code: Percentage of firms identifying functioning of the courts as major constraint. The computation of the indicator is based on the rating of the obstacle as a potential constraint to the current operations of the establishment.

Series Name: Percent of firms identifying transportation as a major constraint
Series Code: Percentage of firms identifying transportation as a major constraint. The computation of the indicator is based on

Country Name: the rating of the obstacle as a potential constraint to the current operations of the establishment.
Series Name: Infrastructure
Percent of firms not needing a loan
Series Code: Percent of firms that did not apply for a loan in the last fiscal year because they did not need a loan. The denominator is the number of firms who did and did not apply for a loan. The numerator is the number of firms

Country Name: who did not apply for a loan and also stated that they did not need a loan.
Series Name: Finance
Percent of firms offering formal training
Series Code: Percentage of firms offering formal training programs for its permanent, full-time employees.

Series Name: Percent of firms owning or sharing a generator
Series Code: Percentage of firms owning or sharing a generator.

Series Name: Percent of firms paying for security
Series Code: Percentage of firms paying for security, for example equipment, personnel, or professional security services.

Series Name: Percent of firms that introduced a new product/service
Series Code: Percentage of firms that introduced new or significantly improved products or services over the last three years.

Series Name: Percent of firms that introduced a process innovation
Series Code: Percentage of firms that introduced any new or significantly improved process.

Series Name: Percent of firms that spend on R&D
Series Code: Percentage of firms that spent on formal research and development activities during the last fiscal year.

Series Name: Percent of firms using banks to finance investments
Series Code: Percentage of firms using banks to finance purchases of fixed assets.

Series Name: Percent of firms using banks to finance working capital
Series Code: Percentage of firms using bank loans to finance working capital.

Series Name: Percent of firms using e-mail to interact with clients/suppliers
Series Code: Percentage of firms using email to interact with clients or suppliers.

Series Name: Percent of firms using material inputs and/or supplies of foreign origin*
Series Code: Percentage of firms that use material inputs and/or supplies of foreign origin.

Series Name: Percent of firms using supplier/customer credit to finance working capital
Series Code: Percentage of firms using credit from suppliers and advances from customers to finance working capital.

Series Name: Percent of firms using technology licensed from foreign companies*
Series Code: Percentage of firms using technology licensed from foreign companies.

Series Name: Percent of firms visited or required to meet with tax officials
Series Code: Percentage of firms that were visited or inspected by tax officials or were required to meet with them over the last year.

Series Name: Percent of firms whose new product/service is also new to the main market
Series Code: Percentage of firms that introduced new or significantly improved products or services over the last three years

Country Name: that were also new for the firms' main market.
Series Name: Innovation and Technology
Percent of firms whose recent loan application was rejected
Series Code: Percent of firms whose recent loan application was rejected.

Series Name: Percent of firms with a bank loan/line of credit
Series Code: Percentage of firms with bank loans or line of credit.

Series Name: Percent of firms with a checking or savings account
Series Code: Percentage of firms with a checking or savings account.

Series Name: Percent of firms with a female top manager
Series Code: Percentage of firms with females as the top manager.

Series Name: Percent of firms with an annual financial statement reviewed by external auditors
Series Code: Percentage of firms with their annual financial statement reviewed by an external auditor.

Series Name: Percent of firms with an internationally-recognized quality certification
Series Code: Percentage of firms that have an internationally-recognized quality certification, i.e. ISO 9000, 9002 or 14000.

Series Name: Percent of firms with at least 10% of foreign ownership
Series Code: Percentage of firms that have at least 10% owned by private foreign individuals, companies or organizations.

Series Name: Percent of firms with at least 10% of government/state ownership
Series Code: Percentage of firms where the government or state has at least a 10% share in ownership of the firm.

Series Name: Percent of firms with female participation in ownership
Series Code: Percentage of firms with females among the owners.

Series Name: Percent of firms with legal status of Sole Proprietorship
Series Code: Percent of firms with legal status of Sole Proprietorship

Series Name: Percent of firms with majority female ownership
Series Code: Percentage of firms with majority female ownership

Series Name: Products shipped to supply domestic markets that were lost due to theft (% of product value)*
Series Code: Value of losses of products, due to theft, while in transit to domestic markets.

Series Name: Proportion of investment financed by banks (%)
Series Code: Estimated proportion of purchases of fixed assets that was financed from bank loans.

Series Name: Proportion of investment financed internally (%)
Series Code: Estimated proportion of purchases of fixed assets that was financed from internal funds/retained earnings.

Series Name: Proportion of loans requiring collateral (%)
Series Code: Loans requiring collateral in order to get the financing.

Series Name: Proportion of permanent full-time non-production workers that are female (%)*
Series Code: Percentage of permanent full-time non-production workers that are female.

Series Name: Proportion of permanent full-time production workers that are female (%)*
Series Code: Percentage of permanent full-time production workers that are female.

Series Name: Proportion of permanent full-time workers that are female (%)
Series Code: Percentage of full-time workers that are female.

Series Name: Proportion of permanent workers (out of all workers)
Series Code: The proportion of permanent workers out of all workers.

Series Name: Proportion of private domestic ownership in a firm (%)
Series Code: Percentage of the firm owned by domestic individuals, companies or organizations.

Series Name: Proportion of production workers (out of all permanent workers)*
Series Code: Proportion of production workers out of all permanent workers*.

Series Name: Proportion of products lost to breakage or spoilage during shipping to domestic markets (%)*
Series Code: Percentage of products shipped to supply domestic markets lost due to breakage or spoilage.

Series Name: Proportion of skilled workers (out of all production workers) (%)*
Series Code: Proportion of skilled workers out of all production workers*.

Series Name: Proportion of temporary workers (out of all workers)
Series Code: The proportion of temporary workers out of all workers.

Series Name: Proportion of total inputs that are of foreign origin (%)*
Series Code: Percentage of material inputs and/or supplies of foreign origin.

Series Name: Proportion of total sales that are exported directly (%)
Series Code: Sales exported directly as percentage of total sales.

Series Name: Proportion of workers offered formal training (%)*
Series Code: Percentage of permanent, full-time employees that have received formal training.

Series Name: Proportion of working capital financed by banks (%)
Series Code: Proportion of the working capital that was financed by bank loans.

Series Name: Real annual labor productivity growth (%)
Series Code: Annual labor productivity growth is measured by a percentage change in labor productivity between the last completed fiscal year and a previous period, where labor productivity is sales divided by the number of full- time permanent workers. All sales values are deflated to 2009 using each country's GDP deflators.

Series Name: Real annual sales growth (%)
Series Code: Real annual sales growth is measured as a percentage change in sales between the last completed fiscal year and a previous period. All sales values are deflated to 2009 using each country's GDP deflators.

Series Name: Senior management time spent dealing with the requirements of government regulation (%)
Series Code: Average percentage of senior management's time that is spent in a typical week dealing with requirements imposed by government regulations (eg. taxes, customs, labor regulations, licensing and registration), including dealings with officials, completing forms, et cetera.

Series Name: Value of collateral needed for a loan (% of the loan amount)
Series Code: Value of collateral needed for a loan or line of credit as a percentage of the loan value or the value of the line of

Series Name: Finance
Value of gift expected to secure a government contract (% of contract value)
Series Code: Percentage of contract value expected as a gift to secure government contract. Only firms that have confirmed that they have secured or attempted to secure a government contract in the last 12 months were required to answer this question.

Series Name: Years of the top manager's experience working in the firm's sector
Series Code: Years of experience of the top manager working in the sector.
